advise.givenAdvise: Congrats! Your mental health is stable. Practice gratitude: Reflect on the good things.
You're stable. Build bonds: Connect and seek support from pals and fam.
Mindfulness rocks! Relax with meditation, breathing, and yoga.
Tackle stress: Exercise, chat, chill. Remember, help's around!
Be kind, patient. Talk it out. Recovery's possible!
Go pro! Talk to a therapist for serious help.
